commit.message:
re PR target/1078 (Problems with attributes documentation)

2016-04-16  Sandra Loosemore  <sandra@codesourcery.com>

	PR target/1078

	gcc/cp/

	(handle_com_interface_attribute): Delete.

From-SVN: r235066
